lyrics:
20 contributorsplague lyricsverse 1
i need you pure i need you clean

power to misconstrue
what have they done to you

chorus
infants in infantry
rewrite their history

youre ripe for harvesting
virgin cells to penetrate
too premature to permeate
they cant elucidate

i am the plague
i am the plague

thy gifts dont give to me
now youve been anointed
theyve been asking for it
